name: Jeremia: Nightfall
description:
The Story
A difficult childhood, a misspent youth, and marital problems. This is Jeremia’s past. The past he doesn’t remember at all. Our memories are what tell us who we are. But what if, suddenly, you had none? What if you had to emerge from the darkness on your own strength?
Jeremia wakes up in a world full created by the darkness of his mind without any memories of his last months, So, he starts a journey throughout his personal Dante's inferno.
Jeremia wakes up in a dark forest with an amnesia relating to the last few weeks. Each level will contain three main quests, each quest allows the character to recover is memory.
Obtaining the three fragments, the unlocked memory will give access to the final puzzle that will lead to the next level.

The game
Jeremia is an action puzzle game with a surreal setting.
USing the joypad or the keyboard, the player moves the protagonist within a 3D RealToon setting, divided into closed and sequential levels.
The player passes the level solving the puzzles that he finds exploring the environment.
The puzzles are various, but always based on the concept of Light vs Dark.
Sometimes the player finds the solution using in different ways the torch supplied to Jeremia; other times through the manipulation of the light sources present in the environment.
Each level has been designed to provide the user with about 40/60 minutes of play which can be extended exploring the gameplay and collecting collectibles hidden in the surrounding environment.

Jeremiah: The Nightfall is a puzzle adventure game full of brain teasers and a deep story in a thriller ambiance.
Are you brave enough to play this game?
